attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe it is time we no longer had a royal family. 

Why have a a firgure head and pay them and the goverment to tell us what we can and can't do. 

We believe it is time to cut some taxes by removing the royal family from the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Parasites/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
